name: Let Me Speak to the Manager!
text: Your opponent must type "UwU Iâ€™m sorry Karen, could I offer you a discount?" in the chat. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Karen" from your Deck to your hand. If  3 of your "Let Me Speak to the Manager!" are banished by their own effect; you win the Duel.
